meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be cultivated.
meanings.sent1: The cultivabilities of the soil were evident in the thriving garden.
meanings.sent2: Farmers are always looking for land with good cultivabilities.
meanings.sent3: The cultivabilities of the backyard were so impressive that even the weeds grew beautifully.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a fertile ground, full of endless cultivabilities waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The cultivabilities of the young artist were nurtured by supportive mentors.

meanings.sent1: The cultivabilities of the barren land surprised everyone when it turned into a lush forest.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the cultivabilities of different crops is essential for successful farming.
meanings.sent3: The cultivabilities of the neglected garden were finally unleashed with a little care and attention.
meanings.sent4: In the right hands, even the smallest seed holds vast cultivabilities.
meanings.sent5: The cultivabilities of the community garden brought people together in a shared purpose.
